sn46.48:1.1: “Adiccassa, bhikkhave, udayato etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—arunuggam.
sn46.48:1.2: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattannam bojjhanganam uppadaya etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—kalyanamittata.
sn46.48:1.3: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—satta bojjhange bhavessati, satta bojjhange bahulikarissati.
sn46.48:1.4: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.48:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn46.48:1.6: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.48:1.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
